issues.description: The problem statement and UML diagram specify addGuestStudents(int, String) with a reason parameter, but the solution implementation defines addGuestStudents with only a single int parameter. This mismatch will cause students to implement the method signature incorrectly and fail the provided tests.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the addGuestStudents method in the solution (and template) to match the specification: declare it as public void addGuestStudents(int numberOfNewGuestStudents, String reason) and handle the reason parameter as needed.
